fitness.name: Running
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses your legs and core to move your body.

fitness.name: Cycling
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses your legs to move your body.

fitness.name: Swimming
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses your entire body to move through water.

fitness.name: Weight Lifting
fitness.description: Anaerobic exercise that uses weights to build muscle.

fitness.name: Yoga
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses your body weight to build strength and flexibility.

fitness.name: Pilates
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses your body weight to build core strength and flexibility.

fitness.name: Dance
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses your entire body to move to music.

fitness.name: HIIT
fitness.description: Anaerobic exercise that uses high intensity intervals to burn fat and build muscle.

fitness.name: Kickboxing
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses martial arts moves to burn calories and build strength.

fitness.name: Zumba
fitness.description: Aerobic exercise that uses dance moves to burn calories and build strength.
